dt-option.name: sortClasses
dt-option.summary: Highlight the columns being sorting upon in the table's body
dt-option.description:
DataTables highlight the columns which are being sorted upon in the table's body by adding a class to the cells in that column, which in turn has CSS applied to those classes to highlight those cells.
This is done by the addition of the classes `sorting\_1`, `sorting\_2` and `sorting\_3` to the columns which are currently being sorted on. The integer value indicates the level of sorting when mutli-column sorting. If more than 3 columns are being sorted upon, the `sorting\_3` class is repeated.
Please note that this feature can effect performance, particularly in old browsers and when there are a lot of rows to be displayed as it is manipulating a large number of DOM elements. As such, this option is available as a feature switch to allow this feature to be disabled with working with old browsers or large data sets.
